wishText: On your birthday may your spirit be enriched in light, love, and hope for a prosperous year ahead. Thinking of you on your birthday, and wishing you all the best!. Happy birthday, my love!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
